operations.name: custom_search
operations.description: Performs a web search using Google Custom Search JSON API, with options to restrict to a site and limit results.

operations.name: document_summarize
operations.description: Summarizes the content of a PDF, Word, or text file based on the user query.

operations.name: document_translate
operations.description: Translates the content of a PDF, Word, or text file to the specified target language.

operations.name: search_files
operations.description: Searches for files (PDF, DOCX, TXT) using keywords or semantic content matching.
operations.preview: list of files with paths, titles, and content snippets

operations.name: powerbi_generate_dashboard
operations.description: Generates a Power BI dashboard from a CSV file based on a user query describing desired visuals.

operations.name: run_command
operations.description: Executes Windows cmd.exe commands for file/directory operations with auto-correction. Pass ONLY executable commands (e.g., 'ren file1.txt file2.txt', 'mkdir folder', 'copy src.txt dest.txt', 'del file.txt', 'dir'). Supports all Windows file operations with syntax validation. Auto-converts common patterns (rename→ren, remove→del). Rejects natural language - requires valid Windows command syntax only.

operations.name: open_app
operations.description: Opens a Windows application by name. Matches against installed apps (Start Menu, Desktop, PATH executables, Registry, UWP apps) and user-defined aliases. If no exact app is found, falls back to web search. Supports auto-launch based on similarity score.

operations.name: search_mail
operations.description: Searches recent Gmail messages and extracts up to 10 semantically relevant chunks using TF-IDF similarity. Useful for finding important info from recent emails when exact keyword matches are not available.

operations.name: send_mail
operations.description: Compose and send an email to the given recipient. If the user only provides a draft or short notes, the LLM must refine or fully write the email body in a professional, complete format according to the user’s needs before sending.
operations.undo: Cannot be undone once email is sent
